hero.title: First Aluminum Technology
hero.subtitle: Your Trusted Partner in Disposable Food Packaging Solutions
hero.description: We specialize in high-quality disposable food containers, chopsticks, and aluminum foil packaging for B2B wholesale. Minimum order quantity: 100 boxes.

quality.title: Premium Quality
quality.description: All our products meet international food safety standards with superior materials.

wholesale.title: B2B Wholesale
wholesale.description: Competitive pricing for bulk orders with MOQ starting from 100 boxes.

global.title: Global Reach
global.description: Serving customers worldwide with reliable shipping and logistics.

about.title: About First Aluminum Technology
about.subtitle: Leading the Future of Food Packaging
about.description: First Aluminum Technology is a premier B2B supplier specializing in disposable food packaging solutions. With years of experience in the industry, we provide high-quality aluminum foil containers, disposable food boxes, and eco-friendly chopsticks to businesses worldwide.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide sustainable, safe, and cost-effective food packaging solutions that meet the evolving needs of the global food service industry.

products.title: Our Products
products.subtitle: Premium Disposable Food Packaging Solutions

containers.title: Aluminum Foil Containers
containers.description: Durable and heat-resistant containers perfect for takeaway and food delivery services.

boxes.title: Disposable Food Boxes
boxes.description: Eco-friendly food boxes available in various sizes for different food types.

chopsticks.title: Disposable Utensils
chopsticks.description: High-quality wooden and bamboo chopsticks for Asian cuisine restaurants.

products.moq: Minimum Order Quantity: 100 boxes per product

news.title: Latest News & Updates
news.subtitle: Stay informed about industry trends and company updates

moq.question: What is your minimum order quantity?
moq.answer: Our minimum order quantity is 100 boxes per product to ensure competitive wholesale pricing.

shipping.question: Do you ship internationally?
shipping.answer: Yes, we ship worldwide. Shipping costs and delivery times vary by destination.

samples.question: Can I request product samples?
samples.answer: Yes, we provide samples for quality evaluation. Please contact us for sample requests.

customization.question: Do you offer custom packaging solutions?
customization.answer: Yes, we offer customization options including branding and specific size requirements.
